title: Tree, the living ward
body:
Passive: At the beginning of the game Tree clicks on one of three locations in the game, location A,B, and C. After picking one of the locations they are automatically teleported to the location. Tree then roots himself into the location and stays there the entire game until the game is won or lose.

No- Q,W, E,R

Lore: Tree was just standing in the forest one day when a man came up to him. He said "want to join the league of legends?". Tree said "....". So that is how Tree became a champion in league of legends. 

Advantages: Living ward, can't feed, can't troll ( good for bronze )

Disadvantages: 4 vs 5, Tree is rooted in place

You can buy this champion next patch for ONLY 2IP or 1RP

Champion release skin? The same thing as classic skin but he has a mushroom on his side.

Why buy this champion? THIS IS THE PERFECT CHAMPION FOR BRONZE! JUST THINK YOU CAN'T FEED or TROLL! IT'S 30 MINUTES OF COMPLETE FUN!

 Classic Splash art: {{champion:57}} 

Quote in champion select: *cricket, cricket*

ALL BRONZIES CAN THANK ME FOR CREATING SUCH A CHAMPION! YOU'RE SO WELCOME YOU BAD PLAYERS!

( This is just a joke don't be a cry baby i am in bronze too )

replies.body: Best One-for-all mode champion

Finally, we can reach late game.

To infinity, and beyoooooond!!!!
Then disable surrendering XD, good luck getting out of that game.
Minions eventually win the match on their own.
http://i.imgur.com/KU6K3d8.jpg
aren't you forgetting about minions out there
minion turns to Winions then,
I was thinking the same thing XD
yes it is lol everyoen in one spot and minions end thegame lol

You could actually make an interesting champion based on that idea. 

Give him an ultimate that makes him stationary, prevents him from casting spells or auto attacking, and gives him 3000 armor and magic resist.  He can deactivate his ultimate after 10 seconds or longer if he so wishes.   But he can cast summoners or actives as a tree. 

That could be useful, say the other team is heading to baron and your team can't contest it.  Go to baron and activate tree.  They can't kill you in a realistic time frame and if they try to do baron you can make it a smite steal or come out of tree state and use some sort of execute spell then smite baron. 

If you are in the front line and they engage on you and your team is kiting back, you activate tree.  Now they can't effectively kill you.  If they continue to chase  your team while ignoring you, then you can come out of tree form behind them and attack their carries.  

It would be a very different kind of champ.  could be interesting.

>  Classic Splash art: {{champion:57}} 

Was this a subtle middle finger to Bronze Maokais?

No, Maokai will get a new splash art. This one is for Tree.

Currently, Teemo and Evelynn are the closest to Tree's role, but they're only secondary 'Ward'. At this point, there is no champion with primary 'Ward' role.

I'm sorry you are a little late.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xWT7YK-Wr9A
No, no, no, these are very different concepts my friend. His just does nothing, but mine is has a very good purpose... a living ward!
Still gives more vision than most players.
Kit is similar to Barn, the Sentient Barn.

we knew him well

I actually like the first part of the idea.  A perma rooted champion that can only move every few minutes?  Releases spores into the immediate area?  Map-wide control effects?  Hells ya.  Sounds like fun.
How to change mobility creep 101
His release skin should be a palm tree.
best skin best skin 10/10 sold! Perfect for all for one mode AND URF! What a time to be alive to see such a balanced champion!
Thank you, the skin took a lot of effort to come up with.
I would buy that champion for 7800
He should have QWER that are all vision based but do nothing else.
